processing.mode.java

Class AutoFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.mode.java.AutoFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formatter

    public class AutoFormat
extends java.lang.Object
implements Formatter
    Handler for dealing with auto format. Contributed by Martin Gomez, additional bug fixes by Ben Fry. Additional fixes by Jonathan Feinberg in March 2010.

    After some further digging, this code in fact appears to be a modified version of Jason Pell's GPLed "Java Beautifier" class found here. Which is itself based on code from Van Di-Han Ho from here. [Ben Fry, August 2009]
